name: Garden's Bane - DG's Quest
description:
This is a modded version of Garden's Bane featuring Delinquent Ghost.

The sprite has been updated, and the levels have all been modified to be a much harder challenge than the original game. The invulnerability frames have been halved, so those spikes pack a real punch now!

Only a true 99% God Gamer will defeat DG's Quest and achieves every A+ Rank!
